data: MDGNN Xu et al. (2024)
Multi-relational graph integrating industry and institutional relationships
Hierarchical graph embedding using ALIBI positional encoding
IC improvement: 15% (CSI300) Superior performance on larger datasets
MASTER Li et al. (2024b)
Modeling dynamic stock correlation relationships through cross-attention
Market guidance gating mechanism for feature selection
Ranking metric: +13% Portfolio metric: +47% (CSI300, CSI800)
DoubleAdapt Zhao et al. (2023)
Double adaptation to distribution shift in streaming data
Multi-head transformation layer for feature and label adaptation
Consistent performance improvement across LSTM, GRU, and Transformer implementations. Model-independent adaptability
DPA-STIFormer Yan and Tan (2024)
Feature-centric temporal modeling
Dual-path mechanism using adaptive gating
Superior performance across CSI500, CSI1000, NASDAQ, and NYSE. Improvement in IC and Sharpe Ratio
DANSMP Zhao et al. (2022)
Market knowledge graph at the executive level
Dual attention network for complex entity interactions
Return: 16.97% Sharpe Ratio: 4.628 (CSI300E)
GINN Xu et al. (2024)
Integration of GARCH theory and neural networks
GARCH-based regularization within the LSTM loss function
Consistent excess performance across 7 global indices. Strong zero-shot performance
DIFFSTOCK Daiya et al. (2024)
Diffusion model for market forecasting
Adaptive noise scheduling for stock volatility
Sharpe Ratio improvement: NYSE: +7.92% NASDAQ: +6.18%
Wang et al. (2024b)
LLM integration for news processing
Text-based transformation of numerical forecasts
Superior performance in event-driven market changes. Multi-domain applicability
